DOC.brief_summary: The study will evaluate the efficacy of Ibuprofen administered as suppositories in the treatment of fever in infants and children. Ibuprofen as suppositories is not yet registered in Israel, although widely used in Europe.
DOC.brief_title: Ibuprofen Suppositories Administration in Infants and Children
DOC.detailed_description: The drug will be used in 100 consecutive infants and children admitted with fever at the pediatric ER of the Soroka Medical Center. The information on the drug efficacy will be collected in appropriate parental questionnaires.
DOC.criteria: Infants and children with rectal temperature > 38.5 C Infants < 6 months of age
